name: RESAAS
description: A social network for real estate
overview:
RESAAS is an enterprise social network for real estate professionals, mortgage specialists, home buyers and sellers to connect and communicate in real time.

According to the national board of realtors, 84 percent of realtors are now taking advantage of social media to promote their business.

RESAAS aims to make it even easier to stay connected with all the people you do business with by creating a social network designed specifically for real estate professionals and mortgage specialists.

Agents and brokers can broadcast announcements, new listings, open houses, price changes, sale notifications, and mortgage rates to their entire network as well as all the major social networks with a click of a button. RESAAS also features an innovative question and answer platform called RESAAS Questions where buyers can connect with agents to form relationships. Agents will have powerful tools at their disposal to find the questions they are most interested in answering. Users will be able to get even the toughest questions serviced by agents who care, and find agents to connect with in our agent directory.

RESAAS is also a full featured listing service where agents can post pocket listings and share them easily with their network. Our mobile apps allow for on the fly updates to listings or streaming questions, and even allow for the home owner to get involved in keeping the property listing updated and fresh.
